bibl.title: Physician's and Surgeon's Certificate of Registration, State of Maryland, City of Baltimore, October 12, 1896

div1.p: Physician's and Surgeon's Certificate of Registration, State of Maryland, City of Baltimore.

div1.head: Physician's and Surgeon's Certificate of Registration, State of Maryland, City of Baltimore, October 12, 1896
div1.p: State of Maryland, City of Baltimore, ss.

I, ALVIN ROBERTSON, Clerk of the Circuit Court of Baltimore City, do hereby certify
that Jesse W. Lazear M. D.,
has been duly registered as a Physician and Surgeon under the Act of 1892, chapter
296, as amended by the Act of 1894, chapter 217, of the Code of Public General Laws
of Maryland, entitled,
“Health,” sub-title “Practitioners of Medicine,”
as appears from Liber A. R., No. 1, folio 116, “REGISTRY OF PHYSICIANS AND SURGEONS,”
one of the Records of said Court.

In Testimony Whereof, I hereunto set my hand and
affix the seal of the Circuit Court of Baltimore City,
this 12th. day of October
in the year of our Lord one thousand eight hundred
and ninety six.

SEAL OF THE CIRCUIT COURT OF BALTIMORE CITY
MARYLAND
div1.closer:
Alvin Robertson
Clerk of the Circuit Court of Baltimore City.
